snippet.title: Puyo Puyo (1993, Game Gear) - Full Longplay [1080p60]
snippet.description:
Original Japanese "Puyo Puyo" port of Puzlow Kids - for the SEGA Game Gear
————————————————————————————
Other Puyo Puyo Games for the SEGA Game Gear:

— Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine — 
Story — http://youtu.be/qsj63XxmVBc
Puzzle — http://youtu.be/Un4ihcvQMiM

— Puzlow Kids — 
Story — https://youtu.be/7fq0HJWoV1g
Puzzle — http://youtu.be/38m9R_7oUmU
Original Puyo Puyo — https://youtu.be/xp_lqgdMe_g

— Nazo Puyo — 
Not yet recorded

— Puyo Puyo 2/Tsu — 
https://youtu.be/b1lPlV46Lfw
————————————————————————————

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLnK-0g_LLzdxZsIK_DlrhmXrTLBhWfUvK

See my collection of Puyo Puyo (Sonic Team) gameplays here
